headline: The Hartford Expands Technology Team With New Office In Columbus, Ohio
summary: COLUMBUS, Ohio, January 06, 2026--The Hartford today announced the opening of its newest technology hub in Columbus, Ohio. This strategic expansion is the latest example of the company’s commitment to insurance innovation, collaboration, and delivering exceptional experiences for customers, agents and brokers.
